parameters.name: LogAnalyticsWorkspace
parameters.label: Log Analytics Workspace
parameters.query: resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.operationsmanagement/solutions' | where name contains 'SecurityInsights' | project id = tostring(properties.workspaceResourceId)

parameters.name: AssetIpAddress
parameters.label: Asset Ip Address
parameters.description: IP Address of Asset to view

parameters.name: PurdueLevel
parameters.label: Purdue Level
parameters.description: Value of Purdue Level to view Assets

parameters.name: AssetSeverity
parameters.label: Asset Severity
parameters.description: Value of Severity to view Assets

parameters.name: AlertSeverity
parameters.label: Alert Severity
parameters.description: Value of Severity to view Alerts

parameters.name: CCIP
parameters.label: Command Center IP
parameters.query:
datatable(CommandCenterIpAddr:string) ["Any"]
| union (
    union ForescoutOtAsset_CL, ForescoutOtAlert_CL
    | where isnotempty(CommandCenterIpAddr)
    | distinct CommandCenterIpAddr
)

content.query:
ForescoutOtAsset_CL
| sort by TimeGenerated
| where TimeGenerated between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| where iff((isnull('{CCIP}') or isempty('{CCIP}') or ('{CCIP}' == "Any")), true, CommandCenterIpAddr == '{CCIP}')
| summarize distinctAssets =  count() by IpAddr
| summarize Number_Of_Distinct_Assets = count()
| project Number_Of_Distinct_Assets
content.title: Number of Assets

content.query:
ForescoutOtAlert_CL
| sort by TimeGenerated
| where TimeGenerated between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| where iff((isnull('{CCIP}') or isempty('{CCIP}') or ('{CCIP}' == "Any")), true, CommandCenterIpAddr == '{CCIP}')
//| summarize distinctAssets =  count() by IpAddr
|  summarize Number_Of_New_Alerts = count()
| project Number_Of_New_Alerts
content.title: Number of Alerts

content.query:
ForescoutOtAlert_CL
| where TimeGenerated between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| where iff((isnull('{CCIP}') or isempty('{CCIP}') or ('{CCIP}' == "Any")), true, CommandCenterIpAddr == '{CCIP}')
| where isnotempty(SensorName)
| distinct tostring(SensorName)
|summarize Number_of_Sensors = count()
content.title: Number of Sensors

content.query:
ForescoutOtAsset_CL
| where TimeGenerated between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| where iff((isnull('{CCIP}') or isempty('{CCIP}') or ('{CCIP}' == "Any")), true, CommandCenterIpAddr == '{CCIP}')
| where isnotempty(PurdueLevel)
| where isnotempty(IpAddr)
| distinct IpAddr, tostring(PurdueLevel)
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(PurdueLevel)
| sort by tostring(PurdueLevel) asc
| project PurdueLevel, Count 
| render barchart
content.title: Assets Per Purdue

content.query:
ForescoutOtAlert_CL
//| where TimeGenerated between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| where iff((isnull('{CCIP}') or isempty('{CCIP}') or ('{CCIP}' == "Any")), true, CommandCenterIpAddr == '{CCIP}')
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr)
| where isnotempty(Severity)
| distinct SrcIpAddr, tostring(Severity)
| summarize Count = count() by SrcIpAddr, tostring(Severity)
| sort by tostring(Severity) asc
| project Severity, Count 
| render piechart
content.title: Assets Per Severity

content.query:
ForescoutOtAlert_CL 
| where TimeGenerated between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| where iff((isnull('{CCIP}') or isempty('{CCIP}') or ('{CCIP}' == "Any")), true, CommandCenterIpAddr == '{CCIP}')
| sort by TimeGenerated
//| take 10000
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 6h), tostring(Severity)
| render areachart
content.title: Alerts Over Time

content.query:
ForescoutOtAlert_CL
| where iff((isnull('{CCIP}') or isempty('{CCIP}') or ('{CCIP}' == "Any")), true, CommandCenterIpAddr == '{CCIP}')
| where isnotempty(Severity)
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(Severity)
| project Severity, Count
| render piechart
content.title: Alerts Per Severity

content.query:
ForescoutOtAlert_CL
| where TimeGenerated between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| where iff((isnull('{CCIP}') or isempty('{CCIP}') or ('{CCIP}' == "Any")), true, CommandCenterIpAddr == '{CCIP}')
|summarize NumberOfAlerts = count() by tostring(SrcIpAddr)//, tostring(DstIpAddr)
|sort by NumberOfAlerts
| take 10
|render barchart
content.title: Top 10 Assets with most Alerts

content.query:
ForescoutOtAlert_CL
| where iff((isnull('{CCIP}') or isempty('{CCIP}') or ('{CCIP}' == "Any")), true, CommandCenterIpAddr == '{CCIP}')
| where SensorName <> ""
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(SensorName)
| project SensorName, Count
| render piechart
content.title: Alerts per Sensor

content.query:
ForescoutOtAsset_CL
| where TimeGenerated between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| where iff((isnull('{CCIP}') or isempty('{CCIP}') or ('{CCIP}' == "Any")), true, CommandCenterIpAddr == '{CCIP}')
|sort by TimeGenerated  
| extend first_seen_epoch = todatetime(tostring(FirstSeen))
| extend Duration = now() - first_seen_epoch
| extend SrcIpAddr = IpAddr
| lookup kind=leftouter (ForescoutOtAlert_CL | where Severity == "Critical" | summarize CriticalCount = count() by SrcIpAddr) on SrcIpAddr
| lookup kind=leftouter (ForescoutOtAlert_CL | where Severity == "High" | summarize HighCount = count() by SrcIpAddr) on SrcIpAddr
| lookup kind=leftouter (ForescoutOtAlert_CL | where Severity == "Medium" | summarize MediumCount = count() by SrcIpAddr) on SrcIpAddr
|summarize by IpAddr, CommandCenterIpAddr, tostring(MacAddrs), CriticalCount, HighCount, MediumCount, tostring(FirstSeen), tostring(MainVendorModel), tostring(FirmwareVersion), tostring(HardwareVersion), tostring(SerialNumber), tostring(Labels), tostring(OsVersion), tostring(MainRole), Duration
| distinct Duration, IpAddr, CommandCenterIpAddr, MacAddrs, CriticalCount, HighCount, MediumCount, MainRole, MainVendorModel, FirmwareVersion, HardwareVersion, SerialNumber, Labels, OsVersion, FirstSeen
| project-rename ['Ip Address']=IpAddr, ['CommandCenter Ip Address']=CommandCenterIpAddr, ['MAC']=MacAddrs, ['Critical #']=CriticalCount, ['High #']=HighCount, ['Medium #']=MediumCount, ['Main Role']=MainRole, ['Main Vendor Model']=MainVendorModel, ['Firmware Version']=FirmwareVersion, ['Hardware Version']=HardwareVersion, ['Serial Number']=SerialNumber, ['OS Version']=OsVersion, ['First Seen'] = FirstSeen
|render table
content.title: Assets

content.query:
ForescoutOtAlert_CL
| where iff((isnull('{CCIP}') or isempty('{CCIP}') or ('{CCIP}' == "Any")), true, CommandCenterIpAddr == '{CCIP}')
| where isnotempty(Severity)
//| where Severity == '{AlertSeverity}'
| project TimeGenerated, AlertId, Severity, Status, SrcIpAddr, SrcMacAddr, DstIpAddr, DstMacAddr, CommandCenterIpAddr, SensorName, AlertCategory, CaseId, AlertData, Desc, SrcHostName, DstHostName, SrcPort, DstPort, L2Proto, L3Proto, L4Proto, L7Proto, Labels, MitreTactics, Name, ProfId, ProfModName, EngineName, TypeId
| project-rename ['Time Generated']=TimeGenerated, ['Alert Id']=AlertId, Severity, Status, ['Src IpAddress']=SrcIpAddr, ['Src MAC']=SrcMacAddr, ['Dst IpAddress']=DstIpAddr, ['Dst MAC']=DstMacAddr, ['Command Center IpAddr']=CommandCenterIpAddr, ['Sensor Name']=SensorName, ['Alert Category']=AlertCategory, ['Case Id']=CaseId, ['Alert Data']=AlertData, Desc, ['Src HostName']=SrcHostName, ['Dst HostName']=DstHostName, ['Src Port']=SrcPort, ['Dst Port']=DstPort, ['L2 Protocol']=L2Proto, ['L3 Protocol']=L3Proto, ['L4 Protocol']=L4Proto, ['L7 Protocol']=L7Proto, Labels, ['Mitre Tactics']=MitreTactics, Name, ['Prof Id']=ProfId, ['Prof Module']=ProfModName, ['Engine Name']=EngineName, ['Type Id']=TypeId
| render table
content.title: Alerts

content.query:
ForescoutOtAsset_CL
| where iff((isnull('{CCIP}') or isempty('{CCIP}') or ('{CCIP}' == "Any")), true, CommandCenterIpAddr == '{CCIP}')
|sort by TimeGenerated
| where isnotempty(IpAddr)
| where IpAddr == '{AssetIpAddress}'
| extend SrcIpAddr = IpAddr
| lookup kind=leftouter (ForescoutOtAlert_CL | where Severity == "Critical" | summarize CriticalCount = count() by SrcIpAddr) on SrcIpAddr
| lookup kind=leftouter (ForescoutOtAlert_CL | where Severity == "High" | summarize HighCount = count() by SrcIpAddr) on SrcIpAddr
| lookup kind=leftouter (ForescoutOtAlert_CL | where Severity == "Medium" | summarize MediumCount = count() by SrcIpAddr) on SrcIpAddr
| summarize arg_max (TimeGenerated,CommandCenterIpAddr, tostring(MacAddrs),CriticalCount, HighCount, MediumCount, MainRole, MainVendorModel, FirmwareVersion, HardwareVersion, SerialNumber, Labels, OsVersion, FirstSeen, LastSeen, AssetData) by IpAddr
| project-rename ['Ip Address']=IpAddr, ['CommandCenter Ip Address']=CommandCenterIpAddr, ['MAC']=MacAddrs, ['Critical #']=CriticalCount, ['High #']=HighCount, ['Medium #']=MediumCount, ['Main Role']=MainRole, ['Main Vendor Model']=MainVendorModel, ['Firmware Version']=FirmwareVersion, ['Hardware Version']=HardwareVersion, ['Serial Number']=SerialNumber, ['OS Version']=OsVersion, ['First Seen'] = FirstSeen
content.title: Asset details of IP {AssetIpAddress}

content.query:
ForescoutOtAsset_CL
| where iff((isnull('{CCIP}') or isempty('{CCIP}') or ('{CCIP}' == "Any")), true, CommandCenterIpAddr == '{CCIP}')
| sort by TimeGenerated
| where isnotempty(PurdueLevel)
//| extend selectedPurdueLevel = iff(isnotempty({PurdueLevel}), '{PurdueLevel}', 'notset')
| where PurdueLevel == '{PurdueLevel}'
//| distinct IpAddr, tostring(PurdueLevel)
//| project IpAddr, PurdueLevel
//| distinct IpAddr, tostring(PurdueLevel)
| extend SrcIpAddr = IpAddr
| lookup kind=leftouter (ForescoutOtAlert_CL | where Severity == "Critical" | summarize CriticalCount = count() by SrcIpAddr) on SrcIpAddr
| lookup kind=leftouter (ForescoutOtAlert_CL | where Severity == "High" | summarize HighCount = count() by SrcIpAddr) on SrcIpAddr
| lookup kind=leftouter (ForescoutOtAlert_CL | where Severity == "Medium" | summarize MediumCount = count() by SrcIpAddr) on SrcIpAddr
| summarize arg_max (TimeGenerated, CommandCenterIpAddr, tostring(MacAddrs),CriticalCount, HighCount, MediumCount, MainRole, MainVendorModel, FirmwareVersion, HardwareVersion, SerialNumber, Labels, OsVersion, FirstSeen, LastSeen, AssetData) by IpAddr
| project-rename ['Ip Address']=IpAddr, ['Time Generated']=TimeGenerated, ['Command Center Ip Address']=CommandCenterIpAddr, ['MAC']=MacAddrs, ['Critical #']=CriticalCount, ['High #']=HighCount, ['Medium #']=MediumCount, ['Main Role']=MainRole, ['Main Vendor Model']=MainVendorModel, ['Firmware Version']=FirmwareVersion, ['Hardware Version']=HardwareVersion, ['Serial Number']=SerialNumber, ['OS Version']=OsVersion, ['First Seen']=FirstSeen, ['Last Seen']=LastSeen, ['Asset Data']=AssetData 
| render table
content.title: Assets matching PurdueLevel {PurdueLevel}

content.query:
ForescoutOtAlert_CL
| where iff((isnull('{CCIP}') or isempty('{CCIP}') or ('{CCIP}' == "Any")), true, CommandCenterIpAddr == '{CCIP}')
| where Severity == '{AssetSeverity}'
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr)
| extend IpAddr = SrcIpAddr
| distinct SrcIpAddr,  SrcMacAddr, IpAddr
| lookup ForescoutOtAsset_CL on IpAddr | summarize arg_max (TimeGenerated, CommandCenterIpAddr, tostring(MacAddrs), MainRole, MainVendorModel, FirmwareVersion, HardwareVersion, SerialNumber, Labels, OsVersion, FirstSeen, LastSeen, AssetData) by IpAddr | project-rename ['Ip Address']=IpAddr, ['Time Generated']=TimeGenerated, ['Command Center Ip Address']=CommandCenterIpAddr, ['MAC']=MacAddrs, ['Main Role']=MainRole, ['Main Vendor Model']=MainVendorModel, ['Firmware Version']=FirmwareVersion, ['Hardware Version']=HardwareVersion, ['Serial Number']=SerialNumber, ['OS Version']=OsVersion, ['First Seen']=FirstSeen, ['Last Seen']=LastSeen, ['Asset Data']=AssetData 
| render table
content.title: Assets with Severity - {AssetSeverity}

content.query:
ForescoutOtAlert_CL
| where iff((isnull('{CCIP}') or isempty('{CCIP}') or ('{CCIP}' == "Any")), true, CommandCenterIpAddr == '{CCIP}')
| where isnotempty(Severity)
| where Severity == '{AlertSeverity}'
| project TimeGenerated, AlertId, Severity, Status, SrcIpAddr, SrcMacAddr, DstIpAddr, DstMacAddr, CommandCenterIpAddr, SensorName, AlertCategory, CaseId, AlertData, Desc, SrcHostName, DstHostName, SrcPort, DstPort, L2Proto, L3Proto, L4Proto, L7Proto, Labels, MitreTactics, Name, ProfId, ProfModName, EngineName, TypeId
| project-rename ['Time Generated']=TimeGenerated, ['Alert Id']=AlertId, Severity, Status, ['Src IpAddress']=SrcIpAddr, ['Src MAC']=SrcMacAddr, ['Dst IpAddress']=DstIpAddr, ['Dst MAC']=DstMacAddr, ['Command Center IpAddr']=CommandCenterIpAddr, ['Sensor Name']=SensorName, ['Alert Category']=AlertCategory, ['Case Id']=CaseId, ['Alert Data']=AlertData, Desc, ['Src HostName']=SrcHostName, ['Dst HostName']=DstHostName, ['Src Port']=SrcPort, ['Dst Port']=DstPort, ['L2 Protocol']=L2Proto, ['L3 Protocol']=L3Proto, ['L4 Protocol']=L4Proto, ['L7 Protocol']=L7Proto, Labels, ['Mitre Tactics']=MitreTactics, Name, ['Prof Id']=ProfId, ['Prof Module']=ProfModName, ['Engine Name']=EngineName, ['Type Id']=TypeId
| render table
content.title: Alerts by Severity - {AlertSeverity}
